name: Jafloya
content:
Jafloya was a Wookiee female who was the mother of the Wookiee Mallatobuck, who was nicknamed "Malla." At some point before Jafloya's death, when Malla was very young, Jafloya made a Life Day Orb for the Wookiee holiday of Life Day for her daughter. Long after her mother's passing, Malla reminisced while holding the orb, leading her father-in-law, Attichitcuk, to guess that Jafloya was on her mind.
Jafloya was mentioned in "The Tree of Life," a short story published in the 2021 Life Day Treasury by Cavan Scott and George Mann.
